layout.goal: Keep global layout clean and voice-focused. Do not clutter with unused boilerplate.
rules: Use MUI ThemeProvider and CssBaseline at the root layout level.
Wrap content in a <main> element with minHeight set to 100vh using MUI Box or styled div.
Do not include NavBar or Footer unless explicitly told to.
Ensure layout.tsx only contains global wrappers, theme providers, and children.
Use MUI's responsive design tools to ensure layout works well on mobile.
Avoid adding static content to the layout unless requested (e.g., no hardcoded headings or descriptions).
Only import fonts or global styles if specified.
If modifying metadata, only update title and description relevant to a language learning app.
Always preserve the 'children' prop and make sure the layout works with dynamic routes.
Avoid deprecated styling approaches like makeStyles.
Prefer ThemeProvider and createTheme for global theming.
Use CssBaseline for consistent base styles.
Use Next.js App Router conventions only (e.g., app/layout.tsx, app/page.tsx).
Keep layout.tsx minimal and focused on global concerns.
Respect file-based routing structure and avoid creating pages without confirmation.
